heroSection.description1: Center Up is an educational organization that offers diverse and innovative programs for individuals aged 8 to 24.
heroSection.description2: Through Center Up's programs, young people are given the opportunity to explore different career paths, gain valuable experience, acquire new knowledge, make connections, and develop skills across various fields.

events.title: International Universities
events.description: A comprehensive program designed to guide students through the process of applying to international universities, including application preparation, visa assistance, and scholarship opportunities.

events.title: Summer Camp 2024
events.description: Join us for an exciting summer camp experience where young people can explore new interests, make friends, and develop essential life skills in a fun and supportive environment.

events.title: Career Development Workshop
events.description: A hands-on workshop series focused on helping participants discover their career path, develop professional skills, and build confidence for their future endeavors.

events.title: Leadership Program
events.description: An intensive program designed to develop leadership skills, critical thinking, and teamwork abilities through interactive activities and real-world projects.

mission.title: Why Center Up
mission.openingStatement: Center Up's mission is to create a dynamic, inclusive, and wide-ranging educational environment where every child and young person has the opportunity to unlock their full potential.
mission.beliefStatement: We believe that early access to quality education, hands-on experiences, and personal development tools can shape confident, capable, and socially responsible individuals.
bullets: Find direction in choosing their future profession
Develop essential skills such as communication, teamwork, critical thinking, and leadership
Gain new experiences, knowledge, and friendships
mission.text: At Center Up, we aim not only to educate but to inspire‚Äîempowering every young person with the knowledge, tools, confidence, and community support needed to dream boldly and act decisively. Through our mission, we are committed to shaping a generation that leads with values, vision, and purpose.
mission.concludingStatement: At Center Up, we aim not only to educate but to inspire‚Äîempowering every young person with the knowledge, tools, confidence, and community support needed to dream boldly and act decisively. Through our mission, we are committed to shaping a generation that leads with values, vision, and purpose.

items.description: An immersive camp experience that brings together young people from different backgrounds to learn and grow together.

description.text: Center Up is an educational organization that offers diverse and innovative programs for individuals aged 8 to 24. Through Center Up's programs, young people are given the opportunity to explore different career paths, gain valuable experience, acquire new knowledge, make connections, and develop skills across various fields.

mission.heading: Mission
paragraphs: Center Up's mission is to create a dynamic, inclusive, and wide-ranging educational environment where every child and young person has the opportunity to unlock their full potential. We believe that early access to quality education, hands-on experiences, and personal development tools can shape confident, capable, and socially responsible individuals.

At Center Up, we aim not only to educate but to inspire‚Äîempowering every young person with the knowledge, tools, confidence, and community support needed to dream boldly and act decisively. Through our mission, we are committed to shaping a generation that leads with values, vision, and purpose.
bullets: Find direction in choosing their future profession
Develop essential skills such as communication, teamwork, critical thinking, and leadership
Gain new experiences, knowledge, and friendships
mission.text: At Center Up, we aim not only to educate but to inspire‚Äîempowering every young person with the knowledge, tools, confidence, and community support needed to dream boldly and act decisively. Through our mission, we are committed to shaping a generation that leads with values, vision, and purpose.

vision.heading: Vision
paragraphs: We strive to become one of the most impactful and trusted educational platforms in the region.

Our goal is to create an educational platform and environment where every young person can discover the fields they are passionate about, participate in relevant programs, and have the opportunity for self-development and lifelong learning. We aspire to become the organization where every young individual can unlock their full potential, develop professional and personal skills, and step-by-step reach their dreams.
bullets: Confident and equipped with strong knowledge
Able to navigate the modern job market
Willing and capable of investing in their personal development
Building a future where values matter more than just outcomes
vision.text: Our goal is to create an educational platform and environment where every young person can discover the fields they are passionate about, participate in relevant programs, and have the opportunity for self-development and lifelong learning.‚Ä®We aspire to become the organization where every young individual can unlock their full potential, develop professional and personal skills, and step-by-step reach their dreams.

description.text: Center Up is an educational organization that offers diverse and innovative programs for individuals aged 8 to 24. Through Center Up's programs, young people are given the opportunity to explore different career paths, gain valuable experience, acquire new knowledge, make connections, and develop skills across various fields.

founder.title: Founder
founder.name: Inna Azizyan
founder.biography: I founded the organization when I was just 19 years old. The journey has had its challenges‚Äîmany of them‚Äîbut I've always had a clear goal

items.name: Marketing
items.biography:
I founded the organization when I was just 19 years old. The journey has had its challenges‚Äîmany of them‚Äîbut I've always had a clear goal: to help young people reach their dreams.
Over the past 4 years of Center UP, we've created‚Äîand continue to create‚Äîprograms that truly change lives for us and our participants. In the beginning, I did everything on my own‚ÄîI was both the head of every department and the only employee. Year by year, month by month, we build and share new things with you.

description.heading: Your Path to Global Education
description.text: Center Up provides comprehensive guidance for students pursuing higher education abroad. From selecting the right university to securing a student visa, we support every step of the journey. Our personalized approach includes strategic planning, document preparation, application submission, interview training, and visa assistance. With expert support and a proven process, we help students gain admission to top universities in over 40 countries worldwide.

phases.title: Research & University Selection Phase
phases.description: During this phase, we conduct an in-depth analysis based on the student's academic goals, professional interests and financial capabilities.

phases.title: Document Preparation Phase
phases.description: Center Up provides a comprehensive checklist tailored to the specific requirements of each university and assists in the accurate preparation of all required documents, including:

phases.title: Application Submission Phase
phases.description: In this stage, we launch the official submission of applications. Our specialists oversee the entire process, including:

phases.title: Interview Preparation Phase
phases.description: If the student is invited to an interview, a targeted preparation process begins, which includes:

phases.title: Visa Support
phases.description: The final stage of the process includes full assistance with student visa applications, such as:

studentsAroundWorld.title: Our Students Around the World
studentsAroundWorld.description: Our applicants are accepted to top universities in over 40 countries around the world, including the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, Germany, Australia, France, and many more.

description.heading: A 4-Month Journey of Education, Volunteering, and Personal Growth
description.text: Center Up offers a structured four-month membership program designed for young individuals eager to grow academically, professionally, and personally. Throughout the program, members participate in a variety of enriching activities and events, including:

descriptionItems.heading: Educational Seminars
descriptionItems.text:
Members take part in seven or more practical educational seminars, each ending with a certificate of participation. These seminars aim to provide hands-on knowledge and skill development in relevant areas. Topics include:

  • How to Get Admitted to American University of Armenia
  • How to Apply to International Universities
  • How to Write a Professional CV/Resume
  • How to Prepare for Job/University Interviews
  • Unlock the World: Erasmus & FLEX
  • Mastering Google Tools
  • The final seminar topic is selected based on group interest

descriptionItems.heading: Volunteering Opportunities
descriptionItems.text: Members are given the chance to engage in various volunteer initiatives, actively supporting the organization of events such as exhibitions, conferences, concerts, and educational programs.This is an excellent opportunity to: develop both personal and professional skills, gain hands-on experience and contribute to exciting, real-world projects and events

descriptionItems.heading: Entertainment & Social Events
descriptionItems.text:
The program includes eight fun and interactive social events that create space for bonding, collaboration, and creativity. Highlights include:

  • Welcome/Introduction Day
  • Mafia Championship
  • "The Smartest" Academic & Entertainment Game
  • What? Where? When?
  • Mystery Night
  • 3 OFF
  • Sports Day
  • Graduation Party

These events are designed not only for fun, but also to enhance teamwork, communication, and create unforgettable memories.

descriptionItems.heading: What Participants Receive Upon Completion
descriptionItems.text:
Members who successfully complete the 4-month program receive:

  • A Certificate of Completion from Center Up
  • Individual Certificates for Each Seminar Attended
  • Individual Certificates for Each Volunteer Participation
  • New knowledge and practical skills
  • Lifelong friendships and unforgettable experiences

descriptionItems.heading: Membership Fees
descriptionItems.text:
• Age Group: 14+ years
  • Program Duration: 4 months
  • Individual Certificates for Each Volunteer Participation

description.heading: An Interactive Career Orientation and Skills Development Program for Children
description.text: Center Up Junior is a four-month educational and interactive program designed to introduce children to a variety of professions, enhance their thinking and communication skills, and help them start shaping their future career paths. The program combines theoretical learning, hands-on project work, and educational excursions, ensuring a rich and memorable experience for every participant.

descriptionItems.heading: Program Goals
descriptionItems.text:
• Introduce children to a wide range of professional fields
  • Help them discover their personal interests and abilities
  • Develop analytical thinking, creativity, and communication skills
  • Promote teamwork, initiative, and a sense of responsibility

descriptionItems.heading: Educational Content
descriptionItems.text:
Children participate in age-appropriate thematic seminars on topics such as:

  • What is a profession?
  • Computer knowledge
  • What are essential communication skills?

descriptionItems.heading: Individual Projects Based on Interests
descriptionItems.text: Starting from the third month of the program, each child, guided by mentors, selects a professional area of interest and begins working on their own individual project. For example, if a child chooses robotics, they will complete the program having designed and created their own robot. This approach fosters: independent working skills, creative thinking and motivation through real, tangible outcomes.

descriptionItems.heading: Professional Visits and Educational Excursions
descriptionItems.text:
The program includes visits to various organizations to help children gain real-world insight into different fields. These visits aim to introduce them to actual work environments and clarify their understanding of how different industries function.

Destinations include:

  • Central Bank of Armenia
  • Pink Berry Production Facility
  • Apache Factory

These excursions allow children to interact with professionals, observe working processes, and expand their perspective on career possibilities.

descriptionItems.heading: What Children Gain
descriptionItems.text:
• Knowledge across multiple fields
  • Communication and teamwork skills
  • Creative and analytical thinking
  • A personal project built from their own ideas
  • New friendships and valuable memories
  • A certificate of participation

descriptionItems.heading: Duration and Cost
descriptionItems.text:
• Age Group: 8‚Äì13 years
  • Program Duration: 4 months
  • Fee: 20,000 AMD per month

description.heading: Educational Guidance Support for Applicants: Smart Choices for a Confident Future
description.text: Future Up is designed for high school students and applicants who are facing crucial educational decisions and want to be confident in their choices. This program is not just about delivering information‚Äîit offers practical guidance and real-life experiences to help participants understand their interests, goals, and potential, turning them into a clear and achievable academic path.

descriptionItems.heading: "From Applicant to Student" Conference
descriptionItems.text: The highlight of the Future Up program is the "From Applicant to Student" conference, which gathers student councils from leading Armenian and international universities, along with dozens of education-minded young people. It's a unique opportunity to meet university representatives, hear their stories, ask questions, and build your own understanding.

descriptionItems.heading: Why Join Future Up?
descriptionItems.text: Expert Talks ‚Äì Over 20 speakers, including current students, alumni, and educational system representatives University Showcases ‚Äì Student councils from local, regional, and international universities share real insights about academic life, faculties, campus environment, and opportunities Q&A Sessions ‚Äì Direct opportunities to ask your questions to university representatives Non-formal Education Booths ‚Äì Explore exchange programs, scholarships, and personal development opportunities presented by leading educational organizations

descriptionItems.heading: What to expect:
descriptionItems.text:
• Gain a realistic understanding of different universities
  • Discover not only academic life but also the social and professional aspects of university experience
  • Receive practical insights to help shape your educational journey
  • Build valuable connections and open the door to new collaborations with universities and organizations

Future Up is not only an informational platform but also a motivational experience that opens a clear path toward confident, well-founded, and purpose-driven educational decisions.

Join us to take one step closer to your successful student future.

description.heading: Unforgettable Camp Experiences
description.text: Center Up offers unique camp programs that combine learning, adventure, and personal growth. Whether you're interested in our Armenian Winter Camp or the International Camp experience, we provide an environment where young people can explore new interests, develop essential skills, and create lasting friendships.

armenianCamp.title: Winter Camp
armenianCamp.description: Are you interested in our 5-day Winter Camp? Let us tell you about the unforgettable and wonderful holiday that awaits you. Center Up's camp programs offer a unique opportunity for personal growth, confidence building, communication skills enhancement, and creating international friendships.

descriptionItems.heading: Program Goals
descriptionItems.text:
• Two delicious and healthy meals per day
  • 24/7 supervision and safety
  • Perfect cleanliness throughout the camp area
  • Experienced and caring group leaders
  • Fun and interactive programs - quests, games, and team challenges
  • Academic certificates awarded at the end of the program

descriptionItems.heading: What Awaits You in This Exclusive Camp
descriptionItems.text: Expert Talks ‚Äì Over 20 speakers, including current students, alumni, and educational system representativesUniversity Showcases ‚Äì Student councils from local, regional, and international universities share real insights about academic life, faculties, campus environment, and opportunitiesQ&A Sessions ‚Äì Direct opportunities to ask your questions to university representativesNon-formal Education Booths ‚Äì Explore exchange programs, scholarships, and personal development opportunities presented by leading educational organizations

descriptionItems.heading: Duration and Cost
descriptionItems.text:
• Location: Tsaghkadzor, Multi Rest House
  • Program Duration: December 22‚Äì27
  • Total fee: 69,000 AMD

internationalCamp.title: International Camps
internationalCamp.description: International Winter Camp with Center Up January 3 - January 12! Get ready for the most unforgettable 10 days of winter in Europe!

descriptionItems.heading: What Awaits You?
descriptionItems.text:
• 10 days full of new opportunities
  • English language courses to boost your skills
  • Exciting adventures, cultural visits & lifelong friendships
  • International certificate ‚Äì valuable for applications to American & international universities!
  • Explore 5 amazing European countries
    • Czech Republic ‚Äì Prague
    • Austria ‚Äì Vienna
    • Germany ‚Äì Dresden
    • Slovakia ‚Äì Bratislava
    • Hungary ‚Äì Budapest

descriptionItems.heading: Competition & Big Discounts!
descriptionItems.text: We're launching a competition where the winners can receive up to 50% OFF! The exact discount will be determined based on your application test results and interview performance. This means the more effort and creativity you put into your application, the higher your chances of receiving a bigger discount!

descriptionItems.heading: Competition Process
descriptionItems.text:
• Application Phase ‚Äì Submit your application and answer all required questions.
  • Test Phase ‚Äì Complete the English language test.
  • Interview Phase ‚Äì If you're invited to the interview, it means you've successfully passed the first two stages!

descriptionItems.heading: What's Included?
descriptionItems.text:
• Comfortable 10-day accommodation in Europe
  • Guided city tours & cultural programs
  • Two meals per day
  • Books & all study materials
  • Airport transfers (to and from the camp)
  • Official international certificate

descriptionItems.heading: Duration and Cost
descriptionItems.text:
Program Duration: January 10-20
Regular Price: ‚Ç¨3200
Discounted Prices:
  • 25% OFF ‚Üí ‚Ç¨2400
  • 35% OFF ‚Üí ‚Ç¨2080
  • 50% OFF ‚Üí ‚Ç¨1600

description.heading: Explore Our Diverse Courses and Activities
description.text: Center Up offers a wide range of courses and activities designed to enhance skills, foster creativity, and provide valuable learning experiences. Our programs cover various fields and interests to help participants discover their passions and develop new competencies.

descriptionItems.heading: Course Offerings
descriptionItems.text: Our courses are designed to be interactive, engaging, and practical. Participants learn through hands-on activities, group projects, and real-world applications. Each course is structured to provide both theoretical knowledge and practical skills.

descriptionItems.heading: Activity Programs
descriptionItems.text: Beyond traditional courses, we offer various activities including workshops, skill-building sessions, creative projects, and collaborative initiatives. These activities are designed to complement our educational programs and provide additional opportunities for growth.

descriptionItems.heading: Duration and Participation
descriptionItems.text:
• Various program durations available
  • Flexible scheduling options
  • Certificates of participation provided

description.heading: Join Our Educational Conferences
description.text: Center Up organizes educational conferences that bring together experts, students, and professionals to share knowledge, discuss current trends, and explore opportunities in various fields. Our conferences provide valuable networking opportunities and insights into career paths and educational journeys.

descriptionItems.heading: Conference Topics
descriptionItems.text: Our conferences cover a wide range of topics including education, career development, technology, leadership, and personal growth. Each conference features expert speakers, panel discussions, and interactive sessions designed to provide valuable insights and practical knowledge.

descriptionItems.heading: What to Expect
descriptionItems.text: Attendees can expect engaging presentations, networking opportunities with peers and professionals, Q&A sessions with experts, and access to resources and materials. Our conferences are designed to inspire, educate, and connect participants with like-minded individuals.

descriptionItems.heading: Conference Schedule
descriptionItems.text:
• Regular conference events throughout the year
  • Both in-person and online options available
  • Certificates of attendance provided

description.heading: Professional Event Organization Services
description.text: Center Up provides comprehensive event organization services for educational events, conferences, workshops, and community activities. Our experienced team ensures that every event is well-planned, executed smoothly, and creates memorable experiences for all participants.

descriptionItems.heading: Event Planning Services
descriptionItems.text: We offer full-service event planning including venue selection, logistics coordination, speaker management, marketing and promotion, registration handling, and on-site event management. Our team works closely with clients to understand their vision and bring it to life.

descriptionItems.heading: Types of Events
descriptionItems.text: Our event organization services cover educational seminars, conferences, workshops, community events, cultural activities, team-building events, and special occasions. We have experience organizing events of various sizes, from intimate workshops to large-scale conferences.

descriptionItems.heading: Why Choose Us
descriptionItems.text:
• Experienced event management team
  • Comprehensive planning and execution
  • Attention to detail and quality

description.heading: Stay Updated with Our Upcoming Events
description.text: Center Up regularly organizes events, workshops, and programs throughout the year. Stay informed about upcoming opportunities to learn, network, and grow. Check back regularly for new events and registration information.

descriptionItems.heading: Event Calendar
descriptionItems.text: Our events calendar includes educational workshops, conferences, seminars, networking events, and special programs. Each event is designed to provide value and opportunities for personal and professional development.

descriptionItems.heading: Registration Information
descriptionItems.text: Registration for upcoming events opens periodically. We recommend checking our website regularly or contacting us directly for information about registration deadlines, event details, and participation requirements.

descriptionItems.heading: Stay Connected
descriptionItems.text:
• Follow us on social media for updates
  • Subscribe to our newsletter
  • Contact us for event inquiries

description.heading: Join Our Camp Programs
description.text: Center Up offers diverse camp programs that provide unique opportunities for personal growth, skill development, and creating lasting friendships. Our camps are designed to inspire, educate, and create memorable experiences for participants of all ages.

descriptionItems.heading: Camp Activities
descriptionItems.text: Our camp programs include a variety of activities such as educational workshops, team-building exercises, creative projects, outdoor adventures, and cultural experiences. Each activity is carefully designed to foster learning, collaboration, and personal development.

descriptionItems.heading: Camp Experience
descriptionItems.text: Participants in our camps benefit from a supportive and inclusive environment where they can explore new interests, develop essential life skills, build confidence, and form meaningful connections with peers and mentors.

descriptionItems.heading: Camp Details
descriptionItems.text:
• Various camp durations available
  • Age-appropriate programs
  • Certificates of participation provided
